title: Light's Bane
summaries: The Light's Bane is a pre-Hardmode broadsword crafted from Demonite Bars.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, it creates a short-lived slash of darkness near the tip of the sword each time it is swung. The slashes has 5 <linked>armor penetration</linked>, and will automatically target enemies within a radius of 3.125 tiles. There are two types of slashes: default small slashes, and random big slashes. Small slashes deal 50% base damage (8 base damage), while big slashes deal 100% base damage (16 base damage). The chance of big slashes occurring equals to the player's melee <linked>critical strike chance</linked>.
Its <linked>Crimson</linked> counterpart is the <linked>Blood Butcherer</linked>, which is stronger and larger but also much slower.

statistics.Damage: 16 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 17 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Melee)
